Title: Chen Zhen (The Fist) I
Publisher: Tianjin renmin meishu chubanshe (天津人民美术出版社)
Notes: "Chen Zhen" (The Fist) was a 20-episode Kung Fu drama produced by Hong Kong Lai TV in 1981. It was produced by Xu Xiaoming and directed by Xu Xiaoming, starring Liang Xiaolong and Yu An'an. The play premiered in February 1982. This play is a sequel to the story "Fearless". Although Chen Zhen died at the end of "Fearless", he was "resurrected" in the show.This poster, and its companion piece, are a cartoon retelling of the story.
